title: Ocean Week cosplay and art contest winners

replies.body:
; A: tHANK YOU RITO//congrats to the other winners too~ there were so many good entries
omg i wish i could tag soapy but
tWO BAULKO KIDS YEY :D
btw my art site is crylica-kress.deviantart.com if anyone wants to check

AAAH I'm so happy for you Shia!! I'm so honored to be up there with you uwu
ThANK YOU RITO FOR THIS GREAT HONOUR
I wish i could draw like you!! congratz! :) :)
im sure you'll reach the top entries too if you just keep drawing :D best of luck~

When the fanart is fantastic but the cosplays are just

...why lol
cosplay contest was specifically to become homeguards =D which is why you will see them with aspects of champions vs in full champion costume.

> [{quoted}](name=ACrizzlehBear,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=AWBwBQtf,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2017-02-14T04:49:01.328+0000)
>
> When the fanart is fantastic but the cosplays are just
> 
> ...why lol

Too true, but hey, can't let them TAS (or textiles depending what school you went you) go to waste aye :D
That Gabbu is a stunner!

Congrats to all the winners! The suspense waiting for this announcement was just... {{summoner:3}} XD
Looking forward to the next community contests! Thanks Rito for the opportunities~ <3
who were the judges lol, these are all terrible, lack of effort is apparent in the first two cosplays they are dressed half casually in shorts and skirts.
cosplay contest was specifically to become homeguards =D which is why you will see them with aspects of champions vs in full champion costume.
Rude asf lol... I'm guessing that yours wasnt even shortlisted?

i took inspiration off the art work riot produced for ocean week cause they had illustrated their own home guards :) and they actually didn't look much like the champions, they looked more like regular oceania residents :) but with some aspects of a champions power. Judging by the ones that won out of those shortlisted, i think riot was picking ones that best represented the idea of 'homeguard' they had presented to the community :)

> [{quoted}](name=Suppeh,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=AWBwBQtf,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2017-02-14T09:01:09.823+0000)
>
> who were the judges lol, these are all terrible, lack of effort is apparent in the first two cosplays they are dressed half casually in shorts and skirts.

Clearly just mad because you don't have what it takes.

OK white knights, explain to me why i would dress up as anything to impress you rofl. It is not rude to say i think its bad cosplay its my opinion, and i am pretty sure some others would think the same. The first 2 cosplays just really didn't stand out to me, i mean sure its supposed to be casual but yeah as zen bot said earlier its pretty meh. So don't blindly assume I am salty because I didn't get chosen (i didn't even enter) because I just expected better effort.
:O WOooooooah thank you!!!! <3 <3 will the winners get emails or anything like that? ^_^ congratz all the other winners you're all talented kittens <3
Ayeeeeeeee, congrats!! :D
<3 :) thank you lovely!!! :D i hope to see more jinx from you in the future :D :D maybe one day we could do a jinx photoshoot together <3 that would be magical heh!! :D
yassssssss, hmu when you have your cos together! :D
Yep I will be sending out emails =D
AWEsOME I will be anticipating that :D :D Thank you again :D
Well done everyone, they all look amazing ;-;
Gg wp guys!:)

Damn nice art :D :D :D
And the cosplay, well i cant do costumes for shit...
WELL PLAYED OCE
^_^ GG oceania haha :) ^_^

omg yay! Thankyou so much! Everyone had such amazing costumes and looked ultra cute, congrats to all the winners <3 giving you all virtual hugs :) Btw the art is also incredible, loving the killer koala :P
Sending virtual hugs back cause you're so kind <3 :) :) must be so hard for them to narrow them all down! cause there were so many amazing entries :) i dont envy their job sometimes :)

Congratulations to those who won :D
I think you all well deserved it ! \(^u^)/
Such awsome stuff :3
^_^ That's so nice to say <3 :) thank you!!!!! :3 :)

The Homeguard badges they've made turned out so well <333
Congrats to all!
How exciting :D thank you so much <3
<3 congratz guys!!!!!!!!!!! :) xx
